main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Oak Forest, Texas, on April 26, 1950, involving a single aluminum colored object observed by two McMillan men.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10-15 minutes,It was described as having an airplane shape and flying at an estimated speed of 120 mph,The object traveled in a straight line from south to north,The weather at the time was clear with good visibility,The observers had a clear view of the object through the windshield of their car.
